                          RoofingDAO roofingDAO,
                          OrderDAO orderDAO)
        Creates a new ConstructionFacade.
        Parameters:
        modelDAO - The dao to use to access model components.
        roofingDAO - The dao to use to access the possible roofings.
        orderDAO - The dao to use to access the orders known to the application.

    • Method Detail

      • construct

        public GarageConstructionSummary construct(int orderId)
                                    throws UnknownOrderException
        Constructs the order with the provided id.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The id of the order to construct.
        Returns:
        The summary of the construction.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When a DataAccessException occurs.
        UnknownOrderException - When the order with the provided id is unknown to the application.
